          	def create
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
          		params[:category][:company_id] = current_user.company_id
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
          		@category = Category.new(params[:category])
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          		if @category.save
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          			flash[:success] = "Category created."
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
          			redirect_to edit_company_path(current_user.company)
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
          		else
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          			@title = "New"
        
      18.

          		end

          	end
        
      21.

      22.

          	def destroy
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          		@category = Category.find(params[:id])
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          		if @category.company_id == current_user.company_id
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          			@category.destroy
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          			flash[:success] = "Category successfully removed. Any paths with that have been transfered to the 'Unassigned' category."
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
          			redirect_to edit_company_path(current_user.company)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
          		else
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          			alert_and_redirect
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
          		end
        
      31.

          	end

          1
          
              def alert_and_redirect
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          			flash[:error] = "You are not authorized to access the resources of that organization. You're actions have been reported."
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          			redirect_to root_path
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          		end

            def reorder_sections
        
      76. 
      
        
    76.

    78.

          	def continue

      124.

      132.

      134.

          					end

      137.

      138.

          	def dashboard

          		completed_tasks = User.count(

          			:group => "users.id",

          			:joins => "LEFT JOIN completed_tasks on users.id = completed_tasks.user_id and completed_tasks.updated_at > '#{time_sql}'",

          			elsif cp[1] <= 10

    24. 
          
          
          	end
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          # Begin Section Creation  
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
            
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
          	def new
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          3
          
          		@section = Section.new
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          3
          
          		@title = "New section"
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          3
          
          		@path_id = params[:path_id]
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          3
          
          		@path = Path.find(@path_id)
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          3
          
          		unless can_edit_path(@path)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          			flash[:error] = "You cannot add tasks to this path."
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          			redirect_to root_path
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          			return
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          		end
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          	end
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          	
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
          	def create
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          6
          
          		@path_id = params[:section][:path_id]
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          6
          
          		@path = Path.find_by_id(@path_id)
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          6
          
          		if @path.nil?
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          			flash[:error] = "No Path selected for section."
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          			redirect_to root_path and return
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
          		else
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          6
          
          			unless can_edit_path(@path)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
          				flash[:error] = "You cannot add tasks to this path."
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          				redirect_to root_path
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
          				return
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          			end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          6
          
          			@section = @path.sections.build(params[:section])
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          6
          
          			if @section.save
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          4
          
          				flash[:success] = "Section created."
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          4
          
          				if params[:commit] == "Save and New"
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          					redirect_to new_section_path(:path_id => @path.id)
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
          				else
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          4
          
          					redirect_to edit_section_path(:id => @section, :m => "instructions")
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
          				end
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
          			else
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          2
          
          				@title = "New section"
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          2
          
          				@form_title = @title
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          2
          
          				@path_id = @path.id
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          2
          
          				render "new"
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          			end
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
          		end
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
          	end
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
          
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
          # Begin Section Edit
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
          	
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          1
          
          	def edit
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          6
          
          		@title = "Edit section"
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          6
          
          		@path_id = @section.path_id
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          6
          
              @mode = params[:m]
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          6
          
          		if @mode == "tasks"
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          1
          
          			@tasks = @section.tasks.includes(:info_resource)
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          1
          
                @reorder = true if params[:a] == "reorder"
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          1
          
          			render "edit_tasks"
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          5
          
          		elsif @mode == "settings"
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          1
          
          			render "edit_settings"
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          4
          
              elsif @mode == "hidden_content"
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          1
          
                render "edit_hidden_content"
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          3
          
          		elsif @mode == "randomize"
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          1
          
                if @section.randomize_tasks
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          1
          
                  flash[:success] = "Tasks randomly reordered."
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                else
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                  flash[:error] = "There was a problem reordering your tasks."
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                end
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          1
          
                @section.reload
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          1
          
                @tasks = @section.tasks
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          1
          
          			render "edit_tasks"
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
          		else
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          2
          
          			@info_resources = @section.info_resources.all
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          2
          
                render "edit_instructions"
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              end
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
          	end
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
          	
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          1
          
          	def update
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          8
          
              if params[:section][:is_published] == "1"
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1
          
                if @section.tasks.size.zero?
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          1
          
                  flash[:error] = "You need to create at least 1 task for this section before you can make it publicly available."
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          1
          
                  @mode = "settings"
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          1
          
                  render "edit_settings" 
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          1
          
                  return
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                end
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
              end
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          7
          
              if params[:section][:hidden_content]
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                @section.update_attribute(:hidden_content, params[:section][:hidden_content])
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                redirect_to questions_section_path(@section, :hidden_content => true)
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          7
          
              elsif @section.update_attributes(params[:section])
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          4
          
          			flash.now[:success] = "Section successfully updated."
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          4
          
                @mode = "instructions"
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          4
          
          			redirect_to edit_section_path(@section, :m => "instructions")
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
          		else
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          3
          
          			@title = "Edit"
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          3
          
          			render "edit_settings"
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
          		end
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
          	end
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
            
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          1
          
            def reorder_tasks
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
              old_order = @section.tasks.map { |t| [t.id, t.position] }
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
              new_order = params[:tasks][:positions].map { |id, position| [id.to_i, position.to_i] }
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
              revised_order = reorder(old_order, new_order)
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
              revised_order.each do |t|
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                @section.tasks.find(t[0]).update_attribute(:position, t[1])
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
              end
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
              redirect_to edit_section_path(@section, :m => "tasks")
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
            end
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
          	
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          1
          
          	def destroy
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          3
          
          		@section.destroy
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          3
          
          		flash[:success] = "Section successfully deleted."
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          3
          
          		redirect_to edit_path_path(@section.path, :m => "sections")
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
          	end
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
          
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
          # Begin Section Construction
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
          
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          1
          
            def import_content
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          1
          
          		if params[:previous]
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          1
          
          			InfoResource.delete(params[:previous])
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
          		end
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          1
          
              render "import_content"
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
            end
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
            
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          1
          
            def preview_content
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          2
          
          		@info_resource = InfoResource.new
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          2
          
          		@info_resource.obj = params[:section][:file]
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          2
          
          		@info_resource.info_type = "unknown"
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          2
          
          		@info_resource.section_id = @section.id
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          2
          
          		if @info_resource.save
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          2
          
          			render "preview_content"
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
          		else
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
          			flash[:error] = "Could not load content. Please try again."
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
          			render "import_content"
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
          		end
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
            end
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
            
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
            def html_editor
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
            end
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
            
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          1
          
            def research
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          3
          
              @mode = params[:m]
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          3
          
              if params[:m] == "clear"
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          1
          
                if @section.update_attribute("instructions", nil)
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          1
          
                  flash[:success] = "Instructions cleared."
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
                else
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
                  flash[:error] = "Oops! An error occurred and we couldn't clear your instructions. Please try again."
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                end
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          1
          
                redirect_to edit_section_path(@section, :m => "instructions")
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          2
          
              elsif params[:m] == "create"
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          1
          
                @topics = params[:topics].split(",")
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          1
          
                if params[:main_topic]
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
                  @topics << @section.name
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
                end
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          3
          
                @topics = @topics.map {|t| t.strip}
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          3
          
                @quoted_topics = @topics.map {|t| '"'+t+'"'}
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
                
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          1
          
                @use_wikipedia = params[:use_wikipedia] ? true : false;
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          1
          
                @use_youtube = params[:use_youtube] ? true : false;
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          1
          
                @use_google_images = params[:use_google_images] ? true : false;
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          1
          
              elsif params[:m] == "topics"
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          1
          
                @answers = []
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          1
          
                @section.tasks.all.each do |t|
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          3
          
                  @answers << t.describe_correct_answer
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
                end
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          1
          
                @answers = @answers.uniq.join(", ")
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          1
          
                render "research_settings"
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
              else
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
                @topics = []
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
                @quoted_topics = []
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
              end
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
            end
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
            
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          1
          
            def questions
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
              @title = "Generate Questions"
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
              @url = "http://ec2-50-19-152-110.compute-1.amazonaws.com:3000/generate"
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
              @limit = params[:limit]
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
              if params[:hidden_content]
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                text = clean_text(@section.hidden_content)
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
              else
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                text = clean_text(@section.instructions)
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
              end
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
          		if text.nil?
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
          			flash[:info] = "You need to add some content to your section before we can automatically generate tasks for you."
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
          			redirect_to edit_section_path(@section, :m => "instructions")
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
          		else
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
          			@split_paragraphs = split_and_clean_text(text)
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
          			@quoted_paragraphs = @split_paragraphs.map {|t| '"'+t+'"'}
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
          		end
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
            end
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
            
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          1
          
            def generate
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
              @text = params[:text]
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
              uri = URI.parse("http://ec2-50-19-152-110.compute-1.amazonaws.com:3000/generate")
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
              http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
          
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
              http.read_timeout = 90
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
              request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri.request_uri)
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
              request.set_form_data({'text' => @text})
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
              resp, @data = http.request(request)
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
              
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
              unless @data.nil?
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
                logger.debug @data
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
                respond_to do |format|
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
                  format.json
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
                end
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
              end
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
            end
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
            
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          1
          
            def review
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
              @title = "Review Questions"
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
              raw_questions = params[:questions]
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
              @processed_questions = {}
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
              raw_questions.each do |key, value|
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
                value = value.split("?")
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
                question = value[0].to_s + "?"
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
                answer = value[1].to_s
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
                @processed_questions[key] = {:question => question, :answer1 => answer}
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
              end
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
              logger.debug "PQ:"
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
              logger.debug @processed_questions.to_s
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
            end
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          
          
            
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          1
          
            def bulk_tasks
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
              raw_questions = params[:questions]
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          
          
              @processed_questions = {}
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
              raw_questions.each do |key, values|
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
                new_task = @section.tasks.build(values.merge(:points => 10))
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
                unless new_task.save
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
                  @processed_questions[key] = values.merge(:errors => new_task.errors.full_messages)
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          
          
                end
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
              end
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          
          
              if @processed_questions.size > 0
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = "Could not save the following tasks. Please review and resubmit."
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          
          
                render "review"
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
              else
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
                flash[:success] = "All tasks successfully added!"
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
                redirect_to edit_section_path(@section, :m => "tasks")
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          
          
              end
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          
          
            end
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          
          
          
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          
          
          # Begin Section Journey
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          
          
            
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          1
          
            def continue
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          9
          
              @task = @section.next_task(current_user)
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          9
          
              if @task.nil?
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          3
          
                last_task = current_user.completed_tasks.includes(:section).where(["sections.id = ?", @section.id]).first(:order => "completed_tasks.id DESC")
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          3
          
                @answers = current_user.completed_tasks.joins(:task).where(["section_id = ?", last_task.task.section_id]).all
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          3
          
                if !@answers.empty?
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          3
          
                  @total_answers = @answers.size
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          3
          
                  @correct_answers = 0
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          15
          
                  @answers.each {|a| @correct_answers += a.status_id}
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          
          
                end
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          3
          
                @final_section = true if @path.next_section(@section).nil?
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          3
          
                render "results"
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          
          
              else
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          6
          
          			if current_user.still_anonymous?
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          
          
          				@jumpstart = true
        
      279.

          	def request_reset

          	def reset_password
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
          		@user = User.find_by_signup_token(params[:user][:signup_token])

          	def clean_text(text)
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          		return nil if text.nil?
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          		text = text.gsub("This section will include questions on the following topics", "")
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          			.gsub("<b>","  ")
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          			.gsub("</b>","  ")
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          			.gsub("<sub>","")
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          			.gsub("</sub>","  ")

          			.gsub(/<a[^>]*>/im,"  ")

    10. 
          
          
          			.gsub(/<\/a>/im,"  ")

    11. 
          
          
          			.gsub(/<li\b[^>]*>(.*?)<\/li>/im," ")

    12. 
          
          
          			.gsub(/<!--[^>]*-->/im,"")

    13. 
          
          
          			.gsub(/<[\/a-z123456]{2}[^>]*>/im," ")
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          			.gsub(/<[\/bi][^>]*>/im," ")
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
          			.gsub(/\[[^\]]+\]/im," ")
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
          			.gsub(/\([^\)]+\)/im," ")
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          			.gsub("&nbsp;"," ")

    18. 
          
          
          			.gsub("&quot;","")

    19. 
          
          
          			.gsub(/\r\n/," ")

    20. 
          
          
          			.gsub(/"/,"'")
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
          		until text.gsub!(/\s\s/,"").nil?
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          			text = text.gsub(/\s\s/, " ")
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          		end

          	end

          	def split_and_clean_text(text)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          		return nil if text.nil?
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
          		paragraphs = text.split("<p>")
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          		split_paragraphs = []
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          		paragraphs.each do |p|
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          			split_paragraph = p.split(". ")
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          			sentences = []
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          			split_paragraph.each_index do |si|
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          				sentence = split_paragraph[si].chomp + "."
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          				if sentence.length > 35 
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          					sentences << sentence
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          				end
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          				if sentence.length > 160 || sentences.length >= 3
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          					split_paragraphs << sentences.join(" ")
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          					sentences = []
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          				end
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          			end
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          			unless sentences.join(" ").length < 80
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
          				split_paragraphs << sentences.join(" ")
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          			end
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
          		end
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          		return split_paragraphs
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
          	end
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          end

            def find_changes(old, new)
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
              changes = []
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
              old.each_index do |i|
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                old_el = old[i]
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                new_el = new[i]
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                changes << [old_el[0],new_el[1]] unless old[i] == new[i]
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              end
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              return changes

            end

            def change_position_by_id(id, desired_position, ary)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
              index = get_index_of_id(id, ary)
        
      40.

            def move_everything_down_between(upper, lower, ary)

      73.

            def move_everything_up_between(lower, upper, ary)
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
              new_ary = Array.new(ary)
        
      84. 
      
        
    84.

      85.

            def sort_by_position(ary)
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              return ary.sort { |a, b| a[1] <=> b[1] }
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
            end
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
          
        
      98.

    102.

    103.

          1
          
            def reorder(old, new)
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
              changes = find_changes(old, new)
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
              results = Array.new(old)
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
              changes.each do |c|
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                id = c[0]
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                desired_position = c[1]
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                current_position = get_position_of_id(id, results)
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                if going_up?(current_position,desired_position)
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                  results = move_everything_down_between(desired_position,current_position,results)
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                else
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                  results = move_everything_up_between(desired_position,current_position,results)
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                end
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                results = change_position_by_id(id, desired_position, results)
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                results = sort_by_position(results)
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
              end
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
              return results
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
            end
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
          end
        
      122.

          	def self.reset_for_path(path)

              def answers_to_hash_array
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                answer_list = []
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                answers = @task.answers_to_array
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                answer_name = "answer"+self.correct_answer.to_s
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                @answer_list << {:answer_name => answer_name, :answer => answers[self.correct_answer]}
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                answers.each_index do |ai|
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                  unless ai == self.correct_answer
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                    answer_name = "answer"+ai.to_s
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                    answer_list << {:answer_name => answer_name, :answer => answers[ai]}
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                  end
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                end
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                return answer_list
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
              end
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
          end

    config/boot.rb

    1. 
          1
          
          require 'rubygems'
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          # Set up gems listed in the Gemfile.
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          1
          
          gemfile = File.expand_path('../../Gemfile', __FILE__)
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          begin
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          1
          
            ENV['BUNDLE_GEMFILE'] = gemfile
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
            require 'bundler'
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
            Bundler.setup
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          rescue Bundler::GemNotFound => e
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
            STDERR.puts e.message
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
            STDERR.puts "Try running `bundle install`."
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
            exit!
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
          end if File.exist?(gemfile)

          	# test suite.  You never need to work with it otherwise.  Remember that

          # Your secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          # If you change this key, all old signed cookies will become invalid!
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          # Make sure the secret is at least 30 characters and all random,
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          # no regular words or you'll be exposed to dictionary attacks.
        
      7.

      110. 
      
        
    110.

      112.

      132.

      133. 
      
        
    133.

      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
            #   resources :products do
        
      139.

            #     resources :comments

          1

      260.

          1
          
          				@path.reload

          1
          
          				get :show, :id => @path

    262.

          				response.should_not have_selector("a", :content => @section.name)
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          
          
          			end
        
      264.

          require 'spec_helper'

          1

          				@section.instructions.should == nil

          				response.should be_success

          		describe "success" do
        
      345.

          1
          
          			before(:each) do
        
      346. 
      
        
    346. 
          4
          
          				@attr = {:name => "EditTest", 
        
      347.

      348.

      353. 
      
        
    353. 
          1
          
          			it "should change user successfully" do
        
      354. 
      
        
    354. 
          1
          
          				put :update, :id => @user, :user => @attr
        
      355. 
      
        
    355. 
          1
          
          				@user.reload
        
      356. 
      
        
    356. 
          1
          
          				@user.name.should == @attr[:name]
        
      357. 
      
        
    357. 
          1
          
          				@user.email.should == @attr[:email]
        
      358. 
      
        
    358. 
          
          
          				#CANNOT TEST PASSWORD CHANGE
        
      359. 
      
        
    359. 
          
          
          			end
        
      360. 
      
        
    360. 
          
          
          			
        
      361. 
      
        
    361. 
          1

    spec/models/completed_task_spec.rb

    100.0 % covered

    43 relevant lines. 43 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          1
          
          require 'spec_helper'
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          #TODO : Stop creation if user not enrolled
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          1
          
          describe CompletedTask do
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
            	before(:each) do
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          10
          
          		@user = FactoryGirl.create(:user)
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          10
          
              @path = FactoryGirl.create(:path, :user => @user, :company => @user.company)
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          10
          
          		@section = FactoryGirl.create(:section, :path => @path)
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          10
          
          		@task = FactoryGirl.create(:task, :section => @section)
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          10
          
              @user.enroll!(@path)
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          10
          
          		@quiz_session = DateTime.now
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          10
          
          		@attr = { :task_id => @task.id, :status_id => 0, :quiz_session => @quiz_session }
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          10
          
          		@completed_task = @user.completed_tasks.build(@attr)
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          	end
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
          	
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
          	it "should create a new instance given valid attributes" do
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          1
          
          		@completed_task.save!
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
          		@completed_task.reload
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
          		@completed_task.task_id.should == @task.id
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
          		@completed_task.user_id.should == @user.id
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
          		@completed_task.status_id.should == 0
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
          		@completed_task.quiz_session.should == Time.parse(@quiz_session.utc.to_s)
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          	end
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          	
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
          	describe "validations" do
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
          		it "should require a user_id" do
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
          			@completed_task.user_id = nil
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
          			@completed_task.should_not be_valid

          		end
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          		
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
          		it "should accept valid emails" do
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
          			emails = %w[user@example.com THE_USER@foo.bar.org first.last@foo.jp]
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
          			emails.each do |email|
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          3
          
          				user = @company.users.build(@attr.merge(:email => email))
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          3
          
          				user.should be_valid
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          			end
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          		end
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          		
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
          		it "should reject invalid emails" do
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
          			emails = %w[user@example,com THE_USER_AT.foo.bar.org first.last@foo.]
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          1
          
          			emails.each do |email|
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          3
          
          				user = @company.users.build(@attr.merge(:email => email))
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          3
          
          				user.should_not be_valid
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
          			end
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          		end
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
          		
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          1
          
          		it "should reject a duplicate email address" do

          1
          
          			@company.users.create!(@attr.merge(:email => @attr[:email].upcase))
        
      53.

          1

      54.

          		end

          	end

      64.

          		end

          1

          			@company.users.build(@attr.merge(:password => pw, :password_confirmation => pw)).should_not be_valid

          		end

          1
          
          			@user.toggle!(:admin)

    120. 
          1
          
          			@user.should be_admin
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
          		end
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
          		
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          1
          
          		it "should not change the password when toggled" do
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          1
          
          			lambda do
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          1
          
          				@user.toggle!(:admin)
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          1
          
          				@user.reload
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
          			end.should_not change(@user, :encrypted_password)

          		end

          1
          
          			current_salt = @user.salt
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          1
          
          			@user.toggle!(:admin)
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1
          
          			@user.reload
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          1
          
          			@user.salt.should == current_salt
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
          		end

          2
          
          				Path.find_by_id(p.id).should be_nil

    190.

          	describe "points" do

          1

          		describe "debit_points" do
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          1
          
          			it "should add points to spent points" do
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          1
          
          				current_points = @user.spent_points
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          1
          
          				@user.debit_points(@reward.points)
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          1
          
          				@user.spent_points.should > current_points
        
      306.

          1

      311.

          1
          
          			it "should equal the earned points minus the spent points" do
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          1
          
          				@user.earned_points = 100
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          1
          
          				@user.spent_points = 25
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          1
          
          				@user.available_points.should == 75
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          
          
          			end
        
      316. 
      
        
    316.
